gallery of cybernetic interpretations

enter

The digital gallery DOTTOD is a speculative project that aims to provoke in its visitors a reflection on the point of contact between art, design, politics and technology.
The aim is to create a gallery of digital and physical works where the curator, and sometimes the creator, is an artificial intelligence that in a mechanised and “impartially” interprets a subject or object.
The exhibited works become a starting point for further research and discussion.
